official_title: To provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of the Columbiettes.

summary.text: Directs the Postmaster General to issue a special postage stamp in honor of the Columbiettes (the ladies' auxiliary of the Knights of Columbus).

titles.title: To provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of the Columbiettes.
